EmailTemplate.name: Green Shoots - Internal - new credit account and setting up eParcel
EmailTemplate.subject: Green Shoots Credit and eParcel Application Submitted and Confirmed - Action Needed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi All
Please see attached application form for new customer {!Lead.Company}.
Steps: Credit management = create customer account/send welcome pack. then notify Customer Data team (DL HQ CDM Credit Updates) Customer Data team = create customer hierarchy and update Sales force, then notify Contract management in the relevant state Contract management = create contract for customer and notify eParcel Team in the relevant state eParcel team= Setup customer to use eParcel system. Email customer with their login details/reference materials and notify Account Manager and CC eParcelcustomercreation@auspost.com.au once completed.
Note: Please CC eParcelcustomercreation@auspost.com.au in all emails as setup time for each customer needs to be tracked.
